glsa.title: Libtasn1: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Libtasn1 might cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Libtasn1 is a library used to parse ASN.1 (Abstract Syntax Notation One) objects, and perform DER (Distinguished Encoding Rules) decoding.

description.p: Libtasn1 does not properly handle length fields when performing DER decoding.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted DER-encoded object in an application linked against Libtasn1, possibly resulting in Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Libtasn1 users should upgrade to the latest version:
Packages which depend on this library may need to be recompiled. Tools such as revdep-rebuild may assist in identifying some of these packages.
